name: Survival Sense
description:
Survival Sense survive the world with by collecting resources to stay alive by using the help of your sense. "Close your eyes and follow the sense , it will lead you to resources"
"Use the sense wisely to stay alive" Game story A little boy slowly drown into the sleep while playing the game . In his dream he recreate the game he played .He continues the game in his dream. It is a survival game in that we need food and water to survive, which makes  total sense .When we can't find resources  we can use our sense to find resources . Mechanics
  • 3d first person game
  • Survival meter (health ,food, water)
  • Pathfinding system
  • Day-night system
  • Sense System
Controls
  • W/A/S/D or Arrow keys for movement
  • Z key for run
  • Mouse for looking
  • L key to toggle sound
  • M key to switch sense
  • c key for opening control
  • T key for locating food (can only able to use after using switch sense)
  • Y key for locating water (can only able to use after using switch sense)
